author: Sophie Dahl
method: Mix the oats, dried apricots, dried prunes, pumpkin seeds and sunflower seeds together and spoon into a serving bowl. To serve, scatter over a handful of fresh berry fruits and pour over the milk, yoghurt or fruit juice.
ingredients: 100g/7oz oats,  25g/1oz dried apricots, chopped,  25g/1oz dried prunes, chopped,  1 tbsp pumpkin seeds,  1 tbsp sunflower seeds,  fresh berry fruits, to serve,  milk, yoghurt or fruit juice, to serve
